author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pros Holdings Reports Qtrly GAAP Net Loss Per Share $0.53
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Pros Holdings Inc:
* PROS HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* QTRLY GAAP TOTAL REVENUE $46.3 MILLION VERSUS $39.9 MILLION
* QTRLY GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.53 * QTRLY NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.13 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.18, REVENUE VIEW $44.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q1 TOTAL REVENUE $45.6 MILLION TO $46.6 MILLION * SEES Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 TO $0.21 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.18, REVENUE VIEW $43.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 TOTAL REVENUE OF $187.0 MILLION TO $190.0 MILLION
* FY2017 REVENUE VIEW $167.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
